title: OPSHOP open for business
abstract: After all the hard work in preparing for opening day the volunteers at Rushworth’s new OPSHOP happily lined up for a photo. (From left) Elizabeth, Lisa, Gail, Michele, Margaret, Tina, Deborah and Graeme. There were others who couldn’t be there on the day so there is great support for the success of this much needed enterprise in the community.

body.content: Rushworth fans of pre-loved clothing and collectibles have been lamenting the closure of the Salvation Army Op Shop for the past couple of years. So, the anticipation has been building once word was out that a new OPSHOP was in the pipeline. Needless to say the opening morning on Saturday lived up to expectation, with many delighted customers ready to come and check out the new old wares.
